DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess applicability use ultrasonography confirmation position endotracheal tube ( ETT ) intubate patient .
DOC.brief_title: Ultrasonography Confirming Proper Position Endotracheal Tube
DOC.detailed_description: To assess applicability use ultrasonography compare routine portable CXR confirmation ETT position . To determine accuracy ultrasonography measure depth ETT compare standard CXR method .
DOC.criteria: age > 18 year old either endotracheal nasotracheal intubation normal airway anatomy perform portable CXR intubation presence history neck radiation , cervical spine immobility/instability unstable vital sign unwilling participate denial inform consent
